task_description: 将平面插画风格的黄色饺子转换为Pixar 3D ICON风格

operation_params.style_reference: Pixar 3D cartoon style, Q-version cute design, high-gloss ceramic texture, dual light source (top + 45° front), pure white background
operation_params.additional_prompt: Convert this flat illustration of yellow dumplings into Pixar 3D ICON style. Transform dumplings into 3D with soft dough texture, clear pleated wrinkles on top, slight golden-yellow color. White ceramic plate with smooth finish. Dumplings arranged naturally on plate. Pure white background. 1024x1024px, commercial quality.

metadata.notes: HOO XIANG品牌黄色饺子3D ICON转换
